title: Brooks Running CEO on Running to Success
itunes:title: Brooks Running CEO on Running to Success
description:
Brooks Running CEO Jim Weber discusses his book Running with Purpose: How Brooks Outpaced Goliath Competitors to Lead the Pack.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
